DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of feeding frequency on glucose and insulin metabolism and substrate partitioning.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Feeding Frequency on Glucose and Insulin Metabolism and Substrate Partitioning
DOC.criteria: BMI: 18.525 kg/m2 (lean) Gender: Male Age: subjects has to be older than 18 and including 35 years old Caucasian Metabolic abnormalities such as: 1. Lactose intolerant 2. Diabetes Mellitus 3. Hypertension 4. Hypotension 5. Cardiovascular diseases 6. Asthma and other obstructive pulmonary diseases 7. Elevated fasting blood glucose level
